info.author: Taizo ITO
info.description:
Pysilhouette is a python-based background job manager,
    intended to co-work with various python-based web applications.
    It makes it available to get job status to programmers,
    which was difficult in http-based stateless/interactive session before.
    100% Pure Python.
info.name: pysilhouette
info.html_description:
Pysilhouette is a python-based background job manager,
intended to co-work with various python-based web applications. It makes it available to get job status to programmers, which was difficult in http-based stateless/interactive session before. 100% Pure Python.
